apikit-soap:router.apikit-soap:attributes: #[%dw 2.0 output application/java --- { headers: attributes.headers, method: attributes.method, queryString: attributes.queryString }]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json ns ns0 http://v3_0.customer.webservices.csx.dtv.com/ --- { "Cliente-Testata": [{ codice_cliente: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.AlternateKey[0], sorgente_registrazione_lead: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.Source, pdv_registrazione: if(payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.RetailStoreID != null) payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.RetailStoreID else "", tipo_utente: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.CustOrgTypcode, firstname: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.Name.*Name[?($.@Location =='First')][0], lastname: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.Name.*Name[?($.@Location == 'Last')][0], personemail: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.EMail.EMailAddress, personmobilephone: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Telephone.*PhoneNumber[?($.@TypeCode =='MOBILE')][0], phone: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Telephone.*PhoneNumber[?($.@TypeCode =='BUSINESS')][0], billingcity: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Address.City, billingstate: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Address.Territory, billingcountry: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Address.Country, billingpostacode: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Address.PostalCode, billingstreet: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Address.AddressLine1 ++ " " ++ payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Address.AddressLine2 ++ " " ++ payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Address.AddressLine3, billingregion: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Address.County, personbirthdate: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.PersonalSummary.BirthDate, sesso: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.PersonalSummary.GenderType, data_registrazione: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.SignupDate, ultimo_aggiornamento_profilo: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.LastUpdateInfo.UpdateDate, pdv_scelto: if(payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.RetailStoreID != null) payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.RetailStoreID else "", numero_carta: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.Instrument.CardNumber, operatore_dedicato: if(payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.CustomerOwnerID != null) payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.CustomerOwnerID else "" , id_sfdc: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.CustomerID, codice_pdv_preferito: if(payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.Affiliation.RetailStoreID != null) payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.Affiliation.RetailStoreID else "", codice_pdv_registrazione: if(payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.RetailStoreID != null) payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.RetailStoreID else "", codice_pdv_scelto: if(payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.Affiliation.RetailStoreID != null) payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.Affiliation.RetailStoreID else "", brand: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.Brand, interessi_eventi_in_libreria : false, cliente_id: payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.Brand ++ payload.body.addOrUpdateCustomer.customerData.AlternateKey[0] }] }

%dw 2.0 output application/xml ns ns0 http://v3_0.customer.webservices.csx.dtv.com/ --- { addOrUpdateCustomerResponse: { customerId: payload.Response.ExternalKey, externalKey: payload.Response.ExternalKey, sfRecordId: payload.Response.SfRecordId, herokuId: payload.Response.HerokuId, responseMessage: payload.Response.ResponseMessage, responseCode: payload.Response.ResponseCode, 'x-Correlation-Id': payload.Response.'x_correlation_id', timeStamp: payload.Response.timestamp } }
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- payload.rawPoslogString
%dw 2.0 output text/plain --- payload replace "<!\\[CDATA\\[" with "" replace "<![CDATA[" with "" replace ("]"++"]"++">") with ""

%dw 2.0 output text/plain ---
payload replace "</POSLog>" with "" replace ("<POSLog") with "<!-- " replace (".xsd" ++ '"') with " --"
%dw 2.0 output text/plain --- payload replace /.* -->/ with ""
%dw 2.0 output text/plain --- trim(payload)
payload replace /(?:[\t ]*(?:\r?\n|\r\R))+/ with "" replace /.*ETAIL_SALE" >/ with /<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Transaction>/ replace "dtv:" with ""
payload replace " " with "" replace " " with "" replace " " with "" replace " " with "" replace " " with ""

%dw 2.0 output application/xml ---
read(payload, 'application/xml')
%dw 2.0 output application/xml --- payload

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { Transazione: [{ codice_transazione: payload.Transaction.SequenceNumber as String, transazione_id: payload.Transaction.SequenceNumber as String, id_pdv: payload.Transaction.RetailStoreID as String, data: payload.Transaction.BusinessDayDate as String, totale_scontrino: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*Total[?($.@TotalType =='TransactionGrandAmount')][0], Transazione_detail: [{ codice_linea: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')][0].SequenceNumber default 0, codice_transazione: payload.Transaction.SequenceNumber as String, ean: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')][0].Sale.ItemID default 0, titolo: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')][0].Sale.Description default "", quantita: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')][0].Sale.Quantity default 0, prezzo_netto: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')][0].Sale.ActualSalesUnitPrice default 0, prezzo_unitario: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')][0].Sale.RegularSalesUnitPrice default 0, sconto: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')][0].Sale.RetailPriceModifier.*Amount[?($.@Action =='Subtract')][0] default 0, prezzo_vendita: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')][0].Sale.RegularSalesUnitPrice default 0, prezzo_esteso: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')][0].Sale.ExtendedAmount default 0, tipologia: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')][0].Sale.*MerchandiseHierarchy[?($.@Level =='DEPARTMENT')][0] default "", descrizione: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')][0].Sale.Description as String default "" }], Transazione_pagamenti: [{ codice_transazione: payload.Transaction.SequenceNumber as String, metodo_di_pagamento: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')].Tender.TenderID[0] default "", ammontare: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')].Tender.Amount[0] default "", codice_pagamento: payload.Transaction.RetailTransaction.*LineItem[?($.@VoidFlag =='false')].Tender.TenderID[0] default "" }], Transazione_indirizzi: [{ codice_transazione: payload.Transaction.SequenceNumber as String }] }] }

%dw 2.0 output application/json ns ns0 http://v3_0.customer.webservices.csx.dtv.com/ --- { Codice_Cliente: payload.body.searchCustomers[0].CustomerID, FirstName: payload.body.searchCustomers.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.Name.*Name[?($.@Location == 'First')][0], LastName: payload.body.searchCustomers.customerData.EntityInformation.Individual.Name.*Name[?($.@Location == 'Last')][0], PersonEmail: payload.body.searchCustomers[0].EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.EMail.EMailAddress, PersonMobilePhone: payload.body.searchCustomers[0].EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Telephone.PhoneNumber, Numero_Carta: payload.body.searchCustomers[0].Instrument.CardNumber, BillingCity: payload.body.searchCustomers[0].EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Address.City, BillingCountry: payload.body.searchCustomers[0].EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Address.Country, BillingPostalCode: payload.body.searchCustomers[0].EntityInformation.Individual.ContactInformation.Address.PostalCode, "x-correlation-id": "123456" }
%dw 2.0 output application/json ns ns0 http://v3_0.customer.webservices.csx.dtv.com/ --- { sfdc_id: payload.body.retrieveCustomer.alternateKeyList.AlternateID, "x-correlation-id": "123456" }
